casebody.data:
HOMESTEAD STUDIO SUITES HOTEL
v.
Sara E. PARKER. No. 385P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2004. Sara E. Parker, Pro Se. Brian Darer, Raleigh, for Homestead Suites Hotel.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 2nd day of August 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2004."
